name: places/ChIJQ0fWuypawokR8hNdm8mdgWE
formattedAddress: 465 Grand St, New York, NY 100024800, USA
adrFormatAddress: 465 Grand St, New York, NY 100024800, USA

originalText.text: In August 2015 I came in requesting a medication adjustment or dosage increase in my depression medication as my mood had worsened over the last few months. I was in medical school at the time and under a lot of stress. She immediately committed me. I never told her I was a threat to myself or others, which I wasn't. She gave no reason for me to be committed. It happened completely out of nowhere. I was taken into another room, instructed to surrender my belongings, and then put into their psychiatric unit for two nights. A social worker (and my mother, who drove down from Richmond) were finally able get me out of the hospital. I can't believe this person is allowed to practice psychiatry. It was the most chaotic experience I've ever had. Having worked as a mental health technician in a psychiatric hospital before, I was shocked at how Carilion handled this situation. It has been 7 years and I still think about this woman and how grossly negligent she was. I can only hope she hasn't done this to a number of other people as well who certainly didn't need it. Please don't trust this doctor.
